rukus.text: dal-eul dugo maengsehasa
salajyeo ganeun bam-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
bichnaneun achim-eul dugo maengseha nani
sillo geugeos-eun gajang jungdaehan jaeang jung-ui hanala
geugeos-eun ingan-eul wihan hanaui gyeong-golo
neohui jung-e apseolyeoneun jawa yuyehalyeoneun jadeul-eul wihan geos-ila
modeun ingan-eun geuga haenghan haeng-wi e uihae jeodang-i doena
upyeon-ui donglyodeul-eun je-oelo
ideul-eun cheongug-eulo deul-eoga seo loga seolo-ege jilmun-eul hamyeo
joeindeul-e gwanhayeo mudgo
mueos-i neohuilo hayeogeum bulji og-e deulge hayeossneunyo lago mul-euni
geudeul-eun daedabhagil jeohuineun ye baehaneun ja jung-e issji anihayeoss-eu myeo
gananhan salamdeul-ege jaseon-eul bepulji anihago
mu-ighan jabdam-eul haneun jadeulgwa gonglon-eul hagon haess-eumyeo
simpan-ui nal-eul midji anhgo
simpan-ui nal-i ondaneun geos-eul bu inhayeossseubnikka
geulihayeo eotteon jungjaejadeul-ui jungjaedo geudeul-ege yuyonghaji moshalila
gyohun-eul geoyeoghan geudeul-i eotteoh ge doeeossneunyo
geudeul-eun machi nollan dangnagwideul i
hanmaliui saja-e nolla domang chineun geosgwa gatdeola
sillo ideul gagjaneun pyeolchyeojin seongseoga geudeul-egedo naelyeojigileul wonhago issneunyo
geugeos-eun bulganeunghan geos-eulo geu deul-eun naeseleul dulyeowo haji anhnola
sillo igeos-i gyohun-ini
geugeos-eul jikilyeo haneun ja geugeos-eul gieogke halila
geuleona hananim-i wonhaneun ja oeeneun eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul gieog halyeo haji ani halila geubun-eun dulyeowo haeya hal junim-iyo gwan-yong-ui junim-isila
